subject: Re: [R] pattern
body:
Schmitt, Corinna wrote:
> Dear R-experts,
> 
> I have the following function:
> 
> userInput <- function() {                      
>    ANSWER <- readline("saving place of the data (example
> Z:/Software/test.mat)? ")
>    x = c(".mat")
>    endingTest = x %in% ANSWER
>    print (endingTest)
>    if (endingTest == "??")
>       cat ("saving place not accepted\n")
>    else 
>       cat("Thank you! The current workspace will be stored in:
> ",ANSWER,"\n\n")
>    print(ANSWER )
> }
> filename = userInput()

Example:


userInput <- function(){
   ANSWER <- readline("saving place of the data (example 
Z:/Software/test.mat)?")
   endingTest <-  length(grep("\\.mat$", ANSWER))
   if(!endingTest)
     cat("saving place not accepted\n")
   else
     cat("Thank you! The current workspace will be stored in:",
          ANSWER, "\n\n")
}
filename <-  userInput()


Uwe Ligges
